description:
It is my first experience to read a book through the Terminal. It looks cool, you only need to press arrows and read ;)

Example of usage:
1. Place your epub file in Documents folder
2. Open Documents folder in Terminal
3. Type: cli-worm  your_file.epub
I wanted to read an epub that Ocular could not handle for whatever reason. This program can. Only issue is that it does not show the pictures.
It works great in Linux. I had problems with it on macOS, but that's okay. I'll use it in Linux.
summary: Does what it says on the box

description: I tried to run the cli-worm command but error messages popped instead of loading the epub

When I start cli-worm there is only an error message poping up.
 I'm using KUbuntu 21.04.
